<!--Source constants file until I get clarity for environment usage across entire package or if sourcing is enough -->
`r source("R/constants.R")`
```{r, echo=FALSE}
source("R/version-utils.R")

dictionary_full_file_names <- list.files(file.path(getwd(),constants$dictionary_directory), pattern = "^ODM.*xlsx$")

max_version <- get_latest_version(dictionary_full_file_names)
max_version <- as.character(max_version)

# Keeping old name for now to work with all existing qmds
dictionary_full_file_name <-""
for (dictionary_name in dictionary_full_file_names) {
  if(grepl(max_version, dictionary_name)){
    dictionary_full_file_name <- dictionary_name
  }
}

dictionary_version_used <- max_version
```
ODM version `r dictionary_version_used`.
